channel.title: Blender on talesrt - Character Artist
channel.description: Recent content in Blender on talesrt - Character Artist

item.title: Glutton
item.description: Model inspired by the outstanding work of Bjorn Hurri (https://www.artstation.com/bjornhurri). It was sculpted in ZBrush with retopology and UV in Blender (with RetopoFlow), bake in Marmoset.

item.title: Wild Flame
item.description:
Had a lot of work and enjoyment doing this game ready character based on the art by Hui Zou (https://www.artstation.com/artwork/rRz6am)

Done during Andre Castro’s advanced class I’m taking, so huge thanks to Andre for the knowledge shared!
